raw_html:
Report name:

MAIB Safety Bulletin 3/2013 - Wacker Quacker 1 / Cleopatra
Incident date:
15 June 2013
Category:
Merchant vessels
Summary:
The sinking of the DUKW amphibious vehicle Wacker Quacker 1 in Salthouse Dock, Liverpool on 15 June 2013 and the fire on board the DUKW amphibious vehicle Cleopatra on the River Thames, London on 29 September 2013. Issued 28 October 2013.
Download report:
Safety Bulletin 3_2013.pdf (4.38 kb)
body:
The sinking of the DUKW amphibious vehicle Wacker Quacker 1 in Salthouse Dock, Liverpool on 15 June 2013 and the fire on board the DUKW amphibious vehicle Cleopatra on the River Thames, London on 29 September 2013. Issued 28 October 2013.
